features.title: GroupDocs.Merger features
features.description: Easily merge, split, and manage PDF and Office documents.

feature_1.title: Merge files
feature_1.content: Combine multiple documents into one, merging entire files or specific pages from different sources.

feature_2.title: Split documents
feature_2.content: Break a document into multiple smaller files for better organization and management.

feature_3.title: Move pages
feature_3.content: Reorder pages within a document by moving them to a new position.

feature_4.title: Remove pages
feature_4.content: Delete specific pages or multiple selected pages from a document.

feature_5.title: Rotate pages
feature_5.content: Rotate pages in a document by 90, 180, or 270 degrees as needed.

feature_6.title: Swap pages
feature_6.content: Switch the positions of two pages within a document for better arrangement.

feature_7.title: Extract pages
feature_7.content: Select and extract specific pages or page ranges to create a new document.

feature_8.title: Change orientation
feature_8.content: Adjust page orientation to portrait or landscape for selected or all pages.

feature_9.title: Preview pages
feature_9.content: Generate image previews of document pages to get a clear view of their content and layout.
